channel.title: Bungie signs 10 year publishing deal with Activision
channel.description:
http://www.destructoid.com/megaton-bungie-signs-ten-year-deal-with-activision-172387.phtml
Surprised no one had posted this before. In other interviews, they pretty much said they can't seem them doing another halo game, ever. Microsoft waving goodbye to one of the few developers making exclusive games for the 360.
Bungie are a good team, and have sold 10 years of their soul to Activision. Granted, Bungie retains all rights to their games and have the control over it.

item.title: Bungie signs 10 year publishing deal with Activision
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

Funny how popular games tend to suck. Halo and Modern Warfare come to mind. Yet I see thousands of fan boys defending it.

Read full topic

item.title: Bungie signs 10 year publishing deal with Activision
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Thug-life:

It isn’t sandbox. It is still as linear as any other Halo game, just with wider open levels.

In the video i watched with the developers they said its a sandbox game now, they may have said they took the sandbox approach, i dont remember. IMO the Halos were always promising when they first came out, but they lose their value quickly.

Read full topic

item.title: Bungie signs 10 year publishing deal with Activision
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:4, topic:338729”][quote author=Frell link=topic=435118.msg3195628#msg3195628 date=1272762550]
They screw up every halo game until Reach, and then that is their last…
[/quote]
What’s so good about Reach?[/quote]
Have you watched any of bungies videos? They’ve fixed alot of things that were wrong with their old games and its sandbox now.

Read full topic

Megaton: Bungie signs ten-year deal with Activision

Surprised no one had posted this before. In other interviews, they pretty much said they can’t seem them doing another halo game, ever. Microsoft waving goodbye to one of the few developers making exclusive games for the 360.

Bungie are a good team, and have sold 10 years of their soul to Activision. Granted, Bungie retains all rights to their games and have the control over it.
